  <script>
   (function(a,s,y,n,c,h,i,d,e){s.className+=' '+y;h.start=1*new Date;
   h.end=i=function(){s.className=s.className.replace(RegExp(' ?'+y),'')};
   (a[n]=a[n]||[]).hide=h;setTimeout(function(){i();h.end=null;},c);h.timeout=c;
  })(window,document.documentElement,'async-hide','dataLayer',2000, {'GTM-MDXF2M':true});
  </script>
  <!-- End Anti-flicker snippet -->
  <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
  <script>
   (function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
            new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
        j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
        'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl+ '&gtm_auth=clplyHpqv5s4qDs-F9_BhQ&gtm_preview=env-1&gtm_cookies_win=x';f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
    })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-MDXF2M');
  </script>
  <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
  <!-- ZD Core Tag -->
  <script>
   (function(){
        window.MPT = { user: {} };
        var coreDone = false;
        var coreScript = document.createElement('script');
        console.time('Core script loaded.');
        console.time('Consent script loaded.');
        var loadConsent = function(){
                    var consentDone = false;
                    var consentScript = document.createElement('script');
                    consentScript.src = 'https://zdstatic.medpagetoday.com/jst/zdconsent.js';
                    consentScript.type='text/javascript';
                    consentScript.async = 1;
                    consentScript.onload = consentScript.onreadystatechange = function(){
                        if(!consentDone || !consentScript.readyState || /loaded|complete/.test( consentScript.readyState )){
                            consentDone = true;
                            console.timeEnd('Consent script loaded.');
                            window.MPT.zdConsentLoaded = true;
                        }
                    };
                    document.querySelector('head').appendChild(consentScript);
                };

        coreScript.src = 'https://cdn.static.zdbb.net/js/z0WVjCBSEeGLoxIxOQVEwQ.min.js';
        coreScript.type='text/javascript';
        coreScript.async = 1;
        coreScript.onload = coreScript.onreadystatechange = function(){
            if(!coreDone || !coreScript.readyState || /loaded|complete/.test( coreScript.readyState )){
                coreDone = true;
                console.timeEnd('Core script loaded.');
                // Ready to insert zd consent js
                (loadConsent)();
            }
        };
        document.querySelector('head').appendChild(coreScript);
    })();
  </script>

actions","survey_id":"821","surveyquestion":"If it was available in the U.S. now, would you recommend it to your patients?","votingClosed":"0","totalVotes":"32","commentCount":"2","choices":[{"surveychoice_id":"2361","surveychoice_desc":"Yes"},{"surveychoice_id":"2362","surveychoice_desc":"No"}],"survey_taken":"0","choiceIds":[{"choice_id":"2361","surveychoice_desc":"Yes","votes":"16","percentage":50},{"choice_id":"2362","surveychoice_desc":"No","votes":"16","percentage":50}]},"url":"https:\/\/www.medpagetoday.com\/surveys\/91717"}}}
                window.MPT.pageMeta = {"title":"Medical News and Free Online CME | MedPage Today","description":"MedPage Today, a CE and CME accredited medical news service, provides free continuing education to healthcare professionals in addition to the latest news."};
                window.MPT.surveyData = window.MPT.homepageData.survey.articles.survey;
                window.MPT.surveyData.choiceIds = [{"choice_id":"2361","surveychoice_desc":"Yes","votes":"16","percentage":50},{"choice_id":"2362","surveychoice_desc":"No","votes":"16","percentage":50}];
                window.__webpack_public_path__ = '//clf1.medpagetoday.net/assets/scripts/';                
                window.MPT.adZone = 'homepage';
                window.MPT.cpid = '7fbfbc2bdb4a03d8b9cd1bf5b1e66b2c';
                window.MPT.ct = 'homepage';
                window.MPT.catvalue = 'home';
                window.MPT.template = '';
                window.MPT.track = '';
            })();
  </script>
 </head>
 <body data-pagetype="homepage">
  <!-- Double Verify Tag -->
  <script>
   (function(){
      var dvivt = sessionStorage.getItem("dvivt");
      var hard_logged_in = /DOKN=\d+/.test(document.cookie);
    var checkForTag = function() {
      return document.body.querySelector("#doubleverify-tag") === null;
    }

    var injectIvtTag = function(){
      if ((dvivt === null || dvivt === "noresponse") && !hard_logged_in && checkForTag()) {
        var source = "https://pub.doubleverify.com/pub.js?ctx=818052&cmp=DV094363&cbust="+Date.now();
        var tag = document.createElement("script");
        tag.id = "doubleverify-tag";
        tag.src = source;

        document.body.appendChild(tag);

      }
    }
    injectIvtTag();
    }());
  </script>
  <!-- End Double Verify Tag -->
  <h1 style="position: absolute;height: 1px; width: 1px;overflow: hidden;">
   Medical News and Free Online CME
  </h1>

          </div>
         </div>
         <a href="https://www.medpagetoday.com/infectiousdisease/covid19/91667">
          <img alt="COVID-19 UPDATE and Other News over a background of illustrated coronaviruses" class="lede-img lazy" data-linktype="image" data-location="most read" data-src="https://clf1.medpagetoday.net/media/images/91xxx/91667.jpg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>

           </a>

      <section class="mpt-surveys-section module">
       <div class="module">
        <div class="flex-tiles">
         <div class="copy">
          <h2 class="section-title">
           <a data-linktype="title" data-location="survey" href="https://www.medpagetoday.com/surveys">
            Surveys
           </a>
          </h2>
          <div class="article-title">
           <a data-linktype="text" data-location="survey" href="https://www.medpagetoday.com/surveys/91717">
            AstraZeneca COVID Vax: Safe Enough?
           </a>
          </div>
          <p class="dek">
           Several European countries suspended use of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine, though the World Health Organization
           <a href="https://www.who.int/news/item/17-03-2021-who-statement-on-astrazeneca-covid-19-vaccine-safety-signals" target="_blank">
            urged against
           </a>
           such actions
          </p>
          <p class="disclaimer">
           Medpagetoday.com surveys are polls of those who choose to participate and are, therefore, not valid statistical samples, but rather a snapshot of what your colleagues are thinking.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="clipboard">
          <div class="clipboard-top">
          </div>
          <div class="clipboard-board">
           <p class="survey-question">
            If it was available in the U.S. now, would you recommend it to your patients?
           </p>
           <div class="survey-choices">
            <div class="choice-option" data-id="2361">
             Yes
            </div>
            <div class="choice-option" data-id="2362">
             No
            </div>
           </div>
           <div id="showChart">
            <div id="pieChart1">
            </div>
           </div>
           <input class="js-submitSurveyBtn btn" id="submitSurveyButton" name="submit" type="submit" value="Vote"/>
          </div>
          <div class="clipboard-bottom">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>

          </a>

        </div>
